title: Judas Priest - Classic Albums: Britieel - 2001 (DVD5)
description:
Source: DVD5
Format: DVD Video
Video kodek: MPEG2
Audio kodek: AC3
Video: PAL 16:9 (720x576) VBR Auto Letterboxed
Audio: English (Dolby AC3, 2 ch) Russian (Dolby AC3, 2 ch)

Released: 2001
Label: Eagle Rock Entertainment
Genre: Heavy Metal
Total Time: 01:25:29

Documentary about the recording of British Steel. The most remarkable is that the people speaking about that are the own band and Tom Allom, musical engineer of the album. But there's not only interviews, we can find some clips as well as the musicians showing us their technic.
